Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Cuisine \Cui`sine"\ (kw?`z?n"), n. [F., fr. L. coquina kitchen, fr. coquere to cook. See {Kitchen}.] 1. The kitchen or cooking department. [1913 Webster]
2. Manner or style of cooking. [1913 Webster]
cuisine n : the practice or manner of preparing food or the food so prepared [syn: {culinary art}]
